effect.name: Stereo widener
effect.description: This filter enhance the stereo effect by suppressing signal common to both channels and by delaying the signal of left into right and vice versa, thereby widening the stereo effect.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.delay
Delay
parameter.comment: Time in milliseconds of the delay of left signal into right and vice versa.

parameter.name: av.feedback
Feedback Gain
parameter.comment: Amount of gain in delayed signal into right and vice versa. Gives a delay effect of left signal in right output and vice versa which gives widening effect.

parameter.name: av.crossfeed
Cross feed
parameter.comment: Cross feed of left into right with inverted phase. This helps in suppressing the mono. If the value is 1 it will cancel all the signal common to both channels.

parameter.name: av.drymix
Drymix
parameter.comment: Set level of input signal of original channel.
